Generation V.Black: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
Generation V.White: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
Generation V.Black 2: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
Generation V.White 2: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

Generation VI.X: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
Generation VI.Y: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This Pokémon has a cowardly disposition, so when it's not around friends, it basically always stays transformed as something else.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: If a normally talkative child suddenly stops talking, it may have been replaced by Zorua.

Generation VIII.Sword: Zorua is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of Zorua's ability to take on the forms of other creatures.
Generation VIII.Shield: Zorua sometimes transforms into a person and goes into cities to search for food. When Zorua does this, it usually takes on the form of a child.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A once-departed soul, returned to life in Hisui. Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
Generation IX.Violet: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

Generation V.Black: Castelia City (requires fateful encounter Celebi ) Breed Zoroark (requires Shiny fateful encounter Entei , Raikou , or Suicune )
Generation V.White: Castelia City (requires fateful encounter Celebi ) Breed Zoroark (requires Shiny fateful encounter Entei , Raikou , or Suicune )
Generation V.Black 2: Received from Rood in Driftveil City ( N's Pokémon )
Generation V.White 2: Received from Rood in Driftveil City ( N's Pokémon )
